Detailed Description

Contains functions for handling coverage statistics.

Author:
Trevor Williams (trevorw@charter.net)

4/4/2002

Function Documentation

statistic* statistic_create (    ) 
 

Creates and initializes a new statistic structure.

Returns:
Pointer to newly created/initialized statistic structure.
Allocates new memory for a coverage statistic structure and initializes its values.

void statistic_dealloc (  statistic *    stat ) 
 

Deallocates memory for a statistic structure.

Parameters:
stat  Pointer to statistic structure to deallocate from heap.
Destroys the specified statistic structure from heap memory.

void statistic_merge (  statistic *    stat_to,
statistic *    stat_from
) 
 

Merges the results of the stat_from to the stat_to.

Parameters:
stat_to  Statistic structure to merge information into.
stat_from  Statistic structure to be merged.
Adds the values of the stat_to structure to the contents of the stat_from structure. The stat_from structure will then contain accumulated results.
